content: अवचि {c3c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To worship, honour, respect. {@--2@} ({c5c} <ab>U.</ab>) To gather, pick up, pluck (with two <ab>acc.</ab>); गता स्यादवचिन्वाना कुसुमान्याश्रमद्रुमान् <ls>Bk. 6. 10</ls>; वृक्षमवचिनोति फलानि <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--3@} To take off. {@--4@} To let down behind, to open (one's cloak).
